title: Remote printing
author: kirsmi08
body_snippet:
<!--
Only file GitHub issues for bugs and feature requests.  All other topics will be closed.

Before opening an issue, please search for a duplicate or closed issue.
Please provide as much detail as possible for us to fix your issue.
-->

<!-- Bug -->
Configuration:
ALPHA- Win8.1x64 Enterprise - working computer
BETA- W2008 Datacenter - intermediate computer with mRemoteNG 1.75.7008.17907 installed
OMEGA- Win7sp1x64 Enterprise - target computer
all three connected to the same networ...

iterations.description: Issue has no description, no reproducible steps, and the triage comment requesting details has received no response, making it impossible to determine what the actual problem is.

comments.author: robertpopa22
comments.snippet: Triage refresh (P2): this issue has been inactive for a long time. Please retest on the latest build and share reproducible steps, expected vs actual behavior, and logs/screenshots. If there is no confirmation/update, maintainers can close it as stale or not reproducible.

notes:
AI triage: Issue has no description, no reproducible steps, and the triage comment requesting details has received no response, making it impossible to determine what the actual problem is.
Approach: Wait for reporter to provide details about what 'remote printing' means in context (RDP printer redirection settings, specific protocol, error encountered). If no response, close as stale.
